title: CSS Introduction & Selectors Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of CSS fundamentals and selector types

questions.question: Which CSS method is best for large websites?
questions.explanation: External stylesheets are modular and can be reused across pages — ideal for scalability.

questions.question: What does the . in .highlight represent?
questions.explanation: The . syntax targets class names in CSS.

questions.question: Which of the following selectors is most specific?
questions.explanation: ID selectors override class and element selectors when there's a conflict.

questions.question: What does "cascading" in CSS mean?
choices: Styles fall from top to bottom visually
Styles can override others based on priority
Styles scroll down with the page
It has to do with gradient colors
questions.explanation: CSS applies rules in order of specificity and importance — hence "cascading."

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to link an external stylesheet?
questions.explanation: The <link> tag connects external stylesheets to your HTML document.
